Well, have played CS since 1.6, love this game.
Few things that do annoy:
Hacks
Cannot really understand how valve not able to deal with cheats. Maybe does not want to, as it increases skin sales by ~30% or so. 
One way of dealing could be, of signing a deal with Mircrosoft, then scan Windows task manager all the time, that way detecting dodgy software.  
Another way could be make a premium account $50 dollars, when VAC ban would be a lot more painful.
And many other ways....
Map rotation, 
Liked a lot of maps, that have been removed such as Austria, Cobblestone and etc. 
Why valve is not conducting votes from the community on what maps should remain, and what maps should be removed? 

Recommended game, but has its issues.
Really good games, also very good anti-cheat 10/10 would recommend!
